channel.title: Qubes-Whonix does not boot after upgrade from Qubes-Whonix 13 to Qubes-Whonix 14
channel.description: I have followed the Upgrade 13 to 14 guide, but the new templates don't work... VMs based on whonix-ws-14 and whonix-gw-14 don't seem to start. In Qube Manager they have a yellow light state. I don't even know how to start debugging this. Would it make sense to try the other method? Removing the old templates completely and then installing Whonix 14 again?

item.title: Qubes-Whonix does not boot after upgrade from Qubes-Whonix 13 to Qubes-Whonix 14
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Please,

in dom0 terminal.

sudo xl console sys-whonix

Login as user user. Post output of:

sudo systemctl list-units --failed

And then report here:

GitHub

QubesOS/qubes-issues

Contribute to QubesOS/qubes-issues development by creating an account on GitHub.

Read full topic
item.source: Qubes-Whonix does not boot after upgrade from Qubes-Whonix 13 to Qubes-Whonix 14

item.title: Qubes-Whonix does not boot after upgrade from Qubes-Whonix 13 to Qubes-Whonix 14
item.dc:creator: keiZie
item.description:
After reinstall whonix-gw-14 VMs, such as sys-whonix, work as expected, but whonix-ws-14 VMs, anon-whonix, have the same behavior, they don’t boot.

Read full topic
item.source: Qubes-Whonix does not boot after upgrade from Qubes-Whonix 13 to Qubes-Whonix 14

item.title: Qubes-Whonix does not boot after upgrade from Qubes-Whonix 13 to Qubes-Whonix 14
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Reinstall is possible, see:

Whonix

Qubes/Install

How to Install Qubes-Whonix 14

item.source: Qubes-Whonix does not boot after upgrade from Qubes-Whonix 13 to Qubes-Whonix 14

item.title: Qubes-Whonix does not boot after upgrade from Qubes-Whonix 13 to Qubes-Whonix 14
item.dc:creator: keiZie
item.description:
I have followed the Upgrade 13 to 14 guide, but the new templates don’t work… VMs based on whonix-ws-14 and whonix-gw-14 don’t seem to start. In Qube Manager they have a yellow light state. I don’t even know how to start debugging this.
Would it make sense to try the other method? Removing the old templates completely and then installing Whonix 14 again?

Read full topic
item.source: Qubes-Whonix does not boot after upgrade from Qubes-Whonix 13 to Qubes-Whonix 14
